column29: Customer Support**: Enhance customer service on social media with real-time support for digital banking inquiries. This can build trust and resolve issues promptly.  2.Engagement Through Gamification: Introduce gamified elements in your social media strategy, such as challenges or rewards for completing specific digital banking tasks, to make the transition more enticing.  3.Content Diversity: Use a mix of content formats, including stories, reels, and live sessions, to attract different audience segments and keep your content fresh and engaging.  10. **Community Building**: Create online communities or groups where users can share their experiences and tips about digital banking. This fosters a sense of belonging and promotes peer support.  11. **Feedback Mechanisms**: Regularly solicit feedback through surveys and polls about customer experiences and preferences regarding digital banking services. Use this information to tailor future campaigns.  12. **Localized Content**: Tailor content to reflect local cultures, languages, and financial needs to increase relatability and engagement among

column29: 1. Personalized, Data-Driven Campaigns  Use customer data to create personalized messages and offers based on transaction history and digital engagement.  Implement targeted ads for specific digital products like MoPay, e-banking, and mobile apps.    2. Educational Content and Tutorials  Share step-by-step video guides and infographics on how to use digital banking services effectively.  Host live Q&A sessions or webinars with digital finance experts.    3. User-Generated Content and Testimonials  Encourage satisfied customers to share their positive digital banking experiences.  Use their stories in campaigns to build trust and authenticity.    4. Gamification and Rewards  Introduce challenges, quizzes, or digital badges for customers who frequently use digital channels, with rewards for top users.    5. Localized Content for Better Engagement  Create region-specific content to reflect the diverse needs of your customers across Malawi.    6. Leverage Influencers and Micro-Influencers  Partner with influencers who resonate with the bank's target audience for wider reach and credibility.    7. Community Building and Engagement  Build online communities for discussions around financial literacy, investment tips, and digital finance.    8. Responsive and Proactive Support  Automate responses to common digital banking inquiries using chatbots.  Provide 24/7 support on social channels for quick resolutions.    9. Cross-Platform Integration  Use social media to drive traffic to NBM’s app, website, and other digital platforms.  Integrate social links in digital banking interfaces for seamless customer journeys.    10. Data Analytics and Performance Tracking    Regularly analyze social media metrics to refine strategies and identify high-conversion content.

In that way when one wants to know about digital banking they can address that page and get all the clarification they need on digital Banking. But right now it gets mixed with all the communication NBM is trying to put out. Secondly, NBM should start by improving their services first because sometimes we don't pay attention to what you are trying to communicate because we are focused on all the complaints we have.

column29: NBM has being doing good in marketing its products and has influenced my decisions, for instance, I registered for Mo626 after reading a promotional message on social media. Now the bank is marketing the diaspora bank on the app which replaces the paperwork. Promotions like skip the queue have made me opt to pay a fee for a transaction and avoid queuing. However, the complaints mechanism system is not effectively marketed and I wonder if the NBM reads customers feedback on its pages and take them on board.  The automated one, Molly needs to be supported by humans in which when the AI can’t help, should automatically connect customers to humans for immediate help. This has been raised by customers but barely appears in the marketing information. NBM may need to restructure its marketing communications and do more with the app than relying on social media platform. The app is a social media platform that is ignored. There is little information on m626 App. Targeted marketing communication in promotional information is more beneficial than general.
